idea: Thew Pueblo Gourmet Llp is a Limited Liability Partnership firm incorporated on 06 October 2020.
name: THEW PUEBLO GOURMET LLP

idea:
Surprise Elements is an Indian company that prides itself on producing high-quality, natural, handmade bath & body products.


Surprise Elements' journey started as a quest to create natural & organic skincare products with an affordable price tag, keeping the environment in mind.


The vision for the company is to provide good quality, natural ingredient based products that are good for your body. Our products are plant-based and handmade with 100% natural ingredients sourced locally to keep our body & mother nature healthy.
name: Surprise Elements

idea: TTMS LLP (Known as TMSL) stands for Tax Technology Managed Services LLP. TMSL is a modern-day Tax Technology firm that provides tax services- technologically. TMSL is envisioned and founded by leaders to automate the routine and mundane compliances for businesses to focus on the essential strategic functions. With the increased demand for e-linking and e-assessments around the globe, TMSL provides an all-at-source solution to the Indian and GCC Indirect Taxes challenges. With the video experience of the team in erstwhile taxes as well, our expertise is to provide the best solution with a quick turnaround time.
name: TMSL INNOMATE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a forward-thinking digital transformation company that is continually curious and agile in pursuing cutting-edge solutions for the maritime ecosystem. We develop, implement, and support solutions that promote maritime commerce by linking the old and the new. Businesses today require more than mere automation. Success requires digital transformation, integrated business processes, and data-driven decision support tools.

At the heart of Mizzen Digital is our robust commercial SaaS platform, which empowers you, the business process owner, with the ability to accelerate your business growth through process optimization.
name: MIZZEN DIGITAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Flash Nano LLP is formed for production using nano technology and also aims at providing technology based services
name: FLASH NANO LLP

idea:
Bioever is a nature-inspired health/beauty brand. Our products are safe for everyone to use as they are free from parabens, sulphates, colour, chemicals or silicones and help to deliver maximum benefit.

Our products are diligently curated to the highest of standards- starting from their source, to their formulation, and to their packaging. As we continue to develop our line of products, we strive to always emit the same high level of care and attention put into each product and its design.
name: BIOEVER LLP
